snippet: The stakes of a decision to intervene or not are much bigger than the political fortunes of the celebrity politicians involved. The media must respect that.
abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column criticizes way in which news media has chosen to focus on domestic political implications of a military intervention in Syria; contends focus should be on situation in Syria, not the next presidential election in America.
lead_paragraph: The stakes of a decision to intervene or not are much bigger than the political fortunes of the celebrity politicians involved. The media must respect that.

headline.print_headline: The Syria Babble We Don’t Need
headline.main: The Syria Babble We Don’t Need
